Name: Product ingredient
Description: A product ingredient is anything that is an ingredient of a consumer product (such as a packaged food, cosmetic, cleaner, etc.).

Properties.Name: Derived from
Properties.Description: Ingredients that this is derived from. For example, 'milled corn' is derived from 'corn'. Some ingredients can potentially be derived from more than one source;.

Properties.Name: Ingredients
Properties.Description: Use this property with compound ingredients - those ingredients that are listed as containing other ingredients, as in "cheddar cheese (milk, salt, cheese cultures)". Each sub-ingredient can be listed here.

Properties.Name: Variety of
Properties.Description: Ingredients that this is a variety, or kind, of. For example, 'rolled oats' is a variety of 'oats', 'organic lavender oil' is a variety of 'lavender oil'.
